message.content:
Sure, here's the recipe for Flæskesteg in the requested format:

| Ingredients (English) | Ingredients (Danish) |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------- |
| 1 cup flour             | 1 cup flør             |
| 1 cup sugar             | 1 cup sød             |
| 1 cup butter            | 1 cup buter            |
| 1 large egg             | 1 large sjø             |
| 1 tsp baking powder     | 1 tsp bakingsøl     |
| 1 tsp salt               | 1 tsp salt               |
| 1 tsp vanilla extract   | 1 tsp vanille extrakt   |
| 1 cup milk               | 1 cup milke               |
| 1 cup sour cream         | 1 cup sø creme         |
| 1 cup grated cheese    | 1 cup græret flæsk    |
| 1 cup whipped cream     | 1 cup ventet creme     |

| Instructions (English) | Instructions (Danish) |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------- |
| Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) | Sæt vinden til 350°F (175°C) |
| Mix flour, sugar, and butter in a large bowl | Samle flør, sød, og buter i et stort bolle |
| Beat egg, baking powder, salt, and vanilla extract in a separate bowl | Bæde sjø, bakingsøl, salt, og vanille extrakt i et adskilt bolle |
| Add egg mixture to flour mixture and mix well | Leg sjøsamlingen til flørsamlingen og samle god |
| Stir in milk and sour cream | Stir i milke og sø creme |
| Fold in grated cheese | Fold i græret flæsk |
| Pour batter into a greased 9-inch cake pan | Pør batteren i et græret 9-inch kagepane |
| Bake for 25-30 minutes or until toothpick inserted comes out clean | Bak i 25-30 minutter eller indtil en tungstæk indsættet udkommer rød |
| Let cool
